column5: 13mins from Downtown Dallas, 10mins from Deep Ellum, 8mins from Fair Park, Cotton Bowl Stadium and Arboretum, 18mins from AA Center, 15mins from Convention Center. 2000sqft, 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, fully furnished two-story house plan. Minutes from I-30, this house is perfect for your Dallas vacation. Sleeps 10 comfortably and has a full kitchen and beautiful backyard to wooded acres and creek. Open concept living room/kitchen space, two car garage and patio. Brand new furniture and appliances!
